name: SHAPE-SHIFTER (2060218) (2013393)
description:
The only button to use is [SPACE BUTTON], and music will be activated once you press this button due to HTML file, but this is SHAPE-SHIFTER, made by TEAM COCA-COLA and is created by myself Ryan Manyweathers (2060218) & Lucie Sinclair (2013393), and this is a game highly inspired by geometry dash, and was made within scratch. Most of the coding was through a walkthrough tutorial, but we also did a lot ourselves including the assets and artwork being completely our own (except for one balloon) and also we changed parts of the level to cater towards what we wanted. 

we followed a tutorial by 'Scratch genius' on Youtube
